      • image

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
        The main sprite-sheet image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spritesheet

        public Spritesheet(Bitmap bitmap,
                   Tuple2i cellSize,
                   Tuple2i startOffset,
                   int vertGap,
                   int horizGap)
        Instantiates a Spritesheet object from a given Bitmap object (the main image) with sprite-sheet parameters.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The big image to be used as Spritesheet.
        cellSize - Width and height of each sprite in a cell (Assuming cells are equal in size).
        startOffset - Starting position to calculate sprite position (in pixels).
        vertGap - Vertical pixel gap size (0 if none).
        horizGap - Horizontal pixel gap size (0 if none).

      • Spritesheet

        public Spritesheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                   Tuple2i cellSize)
        Instantiates a Spritesheet object from a given BufferedImage object (the main image).
        Parameters:
        image - The big image to be used as Spritesheet.
        cellSize - Width and height of each sprite in a cell (Assuming cells are equal in size).

    • Method Detail

      • crop

        public Bitmap crop(int x,
                   int y)
        Supplies a sub-image within the Spritesheet.
        Parameters:
        x - Number of tiles from left (starting with 0).
        y - Number of tiles from top (starting with 0).
        Returns:
        A sub-image within the Spritesheet.

      • crop

        public Bitmap crop(int x,
                   int y,
                   int cellWidth,
                   int cellHeight)
        Supplies a sub-image within the Spritesheet.
        Parameters:
        x - Number of tiles from left (starting with 0).
        y - Number of tiles from top (starting with 0).
        cellWidth - The width of the selection.
        cellHeight - The height of the selection.
        Returns:
        The image cropped from the Spritesheet image.

      • getScaled

        public Spritesheet getScaled(float scale)
        Generates a scaled copy of the existing Spritesheet.
        Overrides:
        getScaled in class Bitmap
        Parameters:
        scale - Scaling ratio (1f is 1:1 ratio).
        Returns:
        A scaled copy of the Spritesheet.

      • generateAnimation

        public Animation generateAnimation(int duration,
                                   Tuple2i... spriteLoc)
        Generates a series of timed action.
        Parameters:
        duration - Time in seconds to be applied to all generated frames.
        spriteLoc - Location of the sprite's (in terms of cells).
        Returns:
        Generated action with specified cells and provided time for all frames.

      • generateAnimation

        public Animation generateAnimation(int[] duration,
                                   Tuple2i[] spriteLoc)
        Generates a series of timed action. Note that the length of the duration[] must be the same as spriteLoc[].
        Parameters:
        duration - Time in seconds to be applied for each frame. Size should be equal to spriteLoc.
        spriteLoc - Location of the sprite's (in terms of cells).
        Returns:
        Generated action with specified cells and provided time for each frame.

      • generateAnimation

        public Animation generateAnimation(int sequenceOrientation,
                                   int duration)
        Generates a series of timed action, assuming the Spritesheet is either a vertical or horizontal strip (i.e. 1 in width or height) and stores frames for an action.
        Parameters:
        sequenceOrientation - Orientation of the Spritesheet.
        duration - Time in seconds to be applied to every frame.
        Returns:
        Generated action with specified cells and provided time for every frame.

      • generateAnimation

        public Animation generateAnimation(int sequenceOrientation,
                                   int[] duration)
        Generates a series of timed action, assuming the Spritesheet is either a vertical or horizontal strip (i.e. 1 in width or height) and stores frames for an action.
        Parameters:
        sequenceOrientation - Orientation of the Spritesheet.
        duration - Time in seconds to be applied to each frame.
        Returns:
        Generated action with specified cells and provided time for each frame.

      • getScale

        public float getScale()
        Supplies the current scale of the Spritesheet image.
        Returns:
        Current scale of Spritesheet image.

      • getSprites

        public Bitmap[][] getSprites()
        Supplies all the pre-divided sprite's in this sprite-sheet.

      • getVerticalGapSize

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getStartOffset

        public Tuple2i getStartOffset()
        Returns:
        Initial starting offset for sprite calculation.

      • getCellSize

        public Tuple2i getCellSize()
        Returns:
        Dimension for each sprite in this sprite-sheet.
